info.title: Groupomania social network
info.description: This is the documentation of Groupomania social network API.

post.description: User creates his own account. Form-data is required if user put an image file. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

requestBody.description: User account properties. For more details, go to 'UserSignupJson' or 'UserSignupFormdata' schema.

post.description: User logs in his own account.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

post.description: Admin creates an account which can be an admin one. Form-data is required if admin put an image file. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

requestBody.description: User account properties. For more details, go to 'UserPostJson' or 'UserPostFormdata' schema.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: Get all users who have been created after this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: Get all users who have been created before this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Get a limited amount of users.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Returns elements from oldest to newest ('asc') or from newest to oldest ('desc').

parameters.name: activity
parameters.description: Get users activities.

delete.description: Admin deletes all user acounts, except his own.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

get.description: User gets properties of his own account, or admin gets properties of a user account.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of user to return, or 'me' for his own account.

parameters.name: activity
parameters.description: Get user activity.

put.description: User modifies properties of his own account, or admin modifies properties of a user account. Form-data is required if an image file is added. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of user to modify.

requestBody.description: User account properties modifications. For more details, go to 'UserPutJson' or 'UserPutFormdata' schemas. At least one of the 'user' object properties or an image is needed. 'isAdmin' property change will be taken into consideration only if it is made by an admin.

delete.description: User deletes his own account or admin deletes a user account.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of user to delete.

post.description: User creates a post. Form-data is required if an image file is added. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

requestBody.description: Post properties. For more details, go to 'PostJson' or 'PostFormdata' schemas.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: Get all posts who have been created after this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: Get all posts who have been created before this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Get a limited amount of posts.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Returns elements from oldest to newest ('asc') or from newest to oldest ('desc').

parameters.name: fromUserId
parameters.description: Get all posts from a specific user.

parameters.name: reactions
parameters.description: Get reactions of the posts.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Get comments of the posts.

parameters.name: commentsReactions
parameters.description: Get reactions of the posts comments. Only available if comments query is true.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

get.description: User gets properties of a post.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: Id of post to return.

parameters.name: reactions
parameters.description: Get reactions of the post.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: Get comments of the post.

parameters.name: commentsReactions
parameters.description: Get reactions of the post comments.

put.description: User modifies a post of his own, or admin modifies a post. Form-data is required if an image file is added. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: Id of post to modify.

requestBody.description: Post properties modifications. For more details, go to 'PostModifyJson' or 'PostModifyFormData' schemas. Post must always have at least a content or an image.

delete.description: User deletes a post of his own, or admin deletes a post.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: Id of post to delete.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: Get all comments who have been created after this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: Get all comments who have been created before this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Get a limited amount of comments.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Returns elements from oldest to newest ('asc') or from newest to oldest ('desc').

parameters.name: fromUserId
parameters.description: Get all comments from a specific user.

parameters.name: fromPostId
parameters.description: Get all comments from a specific post.

parameters.name: reactions
parameters.description: Get reactions of the comments.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

get.description: User gets properties of a comment.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: Id of comment to return.

parameters.name: reactions
parameters.description: Get reactions of the comment.

put.description: User modifies a comment of his own, or admin modifies a comment.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: Id of comment to modify.

delete.description: User deletes a comment of his own, or admin deletes a comment.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: Id of comment to delete.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

requestBody.description: Reaction properties. Exactly one of 'postId' or 'commentId' must be completed.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: Get all reactions who have been created after this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: Get all reactions who have been created before this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Get a limited amount of reactions.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Returns elements from oldest to newest ('asc') or from newest to oldest ('desc').

parameters.name: fromUserId
parameters.description: Get all reactions from a specific user.

parameters.name: fromPostId
parameters.description: Get all reactions from a specific post.

parameters.name: fromCommentId
parameters.description: Get all reactions from a specific comment.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

get.description: User gets properties of a reaction.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: reactionId
parameters.description: Id of reaction to return.

put.description: User modifies a reaction of his own, or admin modifies a reaction.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: reactionId
parameters.description: Id of reaction to modify.

delete.description: User deletes his own reaction, or admin deletes a reaction.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

parameters.name: reactionId
parameters.description: Id of reaction to delete.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token.

requestBody.description: Report properties. Exactly one of 'postId' or 'commentId' must be completed.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

parameters.name: minDate
parameters.description: Get all reports who have been created after this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: maxDate
parameters.description: Get all reports who have been created before this date. Only the ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) is supported.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Get a limited amount of reports.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Returns elements from oldest to newest ('asc') or from newest to oldest ('desc').

parameters.name: fromUserId
parameters.description: Get all reports from a specific user.

parameters.name: fromPostId
parameters.description: Get all reports from a specific post.

parameters.name: fromCommentId
parameters.description: Get all reports from a specific comment.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

get.description: Admin gets properties of a report.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Id of report to return.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: User token. Must be an admin one.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Id of report to delete.

post.title: Post
post.description: Post schema. At least one of 'content' or 'imageUrl' is required.

reaction.title: Reaction
reaction.description: Reaction schema. Exactly one of 'postId' or 'commentId' must be completed.

report.title: Report
report.description: Report schema. Exactly one of 'postId' or 'commentId' must be completed.

userSignupJson.title: UserSignupJson
userSignupJson.description: User schema used when user creates an account without any image.

userSignupFormdata.title: UserSignupFormdata
userSignupFormdata.description: User schema used when user creates an account with an image. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

userPostJson.title: UserPostJson
userPostJson.description: User schema used when admin creates an account without any image.

userPostFormdata.title: UserPostFormdata
userPostFormdata.description: User schema used when admin creates an account with an image. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

userPutJson.title: UserPutJson
userPutJson.description: User schema used when user changes an account but not the image. At least one property of 'user' object is required. 'isAdmin' property changes won't be taken into consideration if the user modifying is not an admin.

userPutFormdata.title: UserPutFormdata
userPutFormdata.description: User schema used when user changes an account, at least the image. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'. 'isAdmin' property changes won't be taken into consideration if the user modifying is not an admin.

postJson.title: PostJson
postJson.description: Post schema used when user publishes or modifies his post without any image.

postModifyJson.title: PostModifyJson
postModifyJson.description: Post schema used when user modifies his post without any image. He can delete post image with deletePostImage property and post content with deletepostContent property. Post must always have at least a content or an image.

postFormdata.title: PostFormdata
postFormdata.description: Post schema used when user publishes/modifies his post or admin modifies a post with an image file. File type must be 'image/jpeg', 'image/jpg' or 'image/png'.

postModifyFormData.title: PostModifyFormData
postModifyFormData.description: Post schema used when user modifies his post with an image. He can delete post content with deletepostContent property. Post must always have at least a content or an image.

commentPost.title: CommentPost
commentPost.description: Comment schema used when user publishes his comment.

commentPut.title: CommentPut
commentPut.description: Post schema used when user modifies his comment.

reactionPost.title: ReactionPost
reactionPost.description: Reaction schema used when user publishes a reaction. Exactly one of 'postId' or 'commentId' must be completed.

reactionPut.title: ReactionPut
reactionPut.description: Reaction schema used when user modifies his reaction.

reportPost.title: ReportPost
reportPost.description: Report schema used when user reports a post or comment. Exactly one of 'postId' or 'commentId' must be completed.
